allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Biblical_fig_language.db and update .gitignore

- Add Biblical_fig_language.db (105MB) as the single production database
- Remove old database files (Pentateuch_Psalms_fig_language.db, torah_figurative_language.db)
- Update .gitignore to only allow Biblical_fig_language.db
- All individual book databases (Amos.db, Ezekiel.db, etc.) remain ignored
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Configure Google Drive database download for deployment

- Add download_database.py script to fetch DB from Google Drive on build
- Update render.yaml to run download script during deployment
- Update .gitignore to exclude all .db files (downloaded on-demand)
- Remove old database placeholders from git tracking
- Add gdown dependency for reliable Google Drive downloads

This eliminates the 105MB database from git repository:
- Faster git operations
- No GitHub file size limit issues
- No Git LFS costs
- Database auto-downloaded during Render deployment
EOF
)")
